Source.Name: mplayer
Source.Description: MPlayer is a movie player that can run on many platforms. It plays most MPEG/VOB, AVI, Ogg/OGM, VIVO, ASF/WMA/WMV, QT/MOV/MP4, RealMedia, Matroska, NUT, NuppelVideo, FLI, YUV4MPEG, FILM, RoQ, PVA files, supported by many native codecs.

Package.Name: mplayer-gui
Package.Description: mplayer-gui is the default graphical frontend of MPlayer.

Update.Comment: Fix SAMI subtitle parsing buffer overflow, pb #19331
Update.Name: Serdar Dalgıç

Update.Comment: Remove forgotten NoStrip.

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 32442, ffmpeg 25352 Prevent a segfault on mmst streams Handle libavformat adding additional streams during playback

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 32438, ffmpeg 25334 Fix several security issues in flicvideo, fixes CVE-2010-3429 bug #14527 #14530 #14531 Depend on new lame

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 32161, ffmpeg 25106 Fix seeking to first and last frames for flv like formats
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 32021, ffmpeg 24953 Remove unused amr deps, we use only opencore-amr Fix segfault with some avi files

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 32006, ffmpeg 24910
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 31982, ffmpeg 24839 Fix segfaults with flv files Fix cache2 segfault, fixes seeking in some filetypes like flv Revert flash completion as it breaks empty space completion Fix versioning
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 31750, ffmpeg 24320 Fix geometry of GL2 outputs too, fixes bugs #13154 and #13778
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 31743, ffmpeg 24252 Depend on latest libva for new tfp feature Fix a crash on float_to_int16_interleave_sse2 Enable libvpx for VP8 Fix geometry of GL outputs, should fix bug #13154 #13778 Add a few more parameters to bash_completion Add missing dependencies
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 31299, ffmpeg 23406 Fix a regression of video may not be played when stdin is handled by another process Fix crash with some mkv files due to spu parsing Put a parameter to default conf to set where video should stat automatically Revert to internal libass until ass_flush_events is made public
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 31231, ffmpeg 23351 Depend on new x264 and libva, disable vdpau for now for the sake of vaapi Fix heavy load with vaapi, fixes bug #13128

Update.Comment: Add amv to bash completion
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 30815, ffmpeg 22144 Fix threaded h264 decoding Fix buffer management in vdpau
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 30800, ffmpeg 22131 Add latest segfault fixes Fix packed B frame playing with vdpau
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 30741, ffmpeg 22071 Fix latest segfault fixes Update vaapi support Enable parallel build

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 29789, ffmpeg 20334 Fix bframe pyramid in x264

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 29777, ffmpeg 20277 Try to recover from VDPAU display pre-emptions Fix volume restore of pulseaudio, probably will fix gnome-mplayer sond issues

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 29776, ffmpeg 20256 Depend on new x264 Fix alsa buffer management Fix lots of buffer overflows
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 29687, ffmpeg 19909 Fix integer overflow in siearravmd, bug #11175
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 29670 Fix playing of some online mov index like in pbs Add missing dependencies Fix interleaved AVI decoding Add wmapro support Keep volume level on file changes, bug #10846 Many more fixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 29455 Fix opencoreamr usage bug #10480 Fix RDT integer overflow bug #10685 Fix u8 1c pcm playing (thanks to Gökmen Göksel for the sample)

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot to 29418 Add missing dependencies Use libvdpau Enable jack sound system

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot Fix vo state changing on multiple files
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot Fix wrong colorspace conversion Disable joystick support in config only due to popular demand
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Big snapshot bump and get rid of all the backports Remove everything about arts Add more file suffix to bash-completion Allow O3 in flags Put matroska correct-pts workaround
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix overflooding pts messages, this will fix playing of latest matroska files Get flv video bitrate from metadata
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix a signedness error within the "fourxm_read_header()" function in libavformat/4xm.c (bug#9121)
Update.Name: Pınar Yanardağ

Update.Comment: Snapshot bump for lots of enhancements like many performance improvements on x264 decoding, and bugfixes including playing of sound in some media files bug #8588, fix eve-raido playing bug #8851, fix mplayer running as a child and defects caused by this like small video display, not killing the child on exit etc. bug #8948. Will also help fixing bugs #8234, #8559, #8729
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix possible stack overflow in vqf demuxer, fixes CVE-2008-5616, bug #8879
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix bash_completion script by moving it into /etc as bash_completion external dir is there and it treats _filedir etc. better
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix endless loop when opening corrupt FLV files, check sub_packet_size against 0 to avoid div by zero later, only warn about "Invalid and inefficient vfw-avi packed B frames" once
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add bash_completion script, it will be maintained here
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix possibly exploitable yuv2rgb buffer overflow in swscale
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Add support for svq3 watermark, don't use negative size buffer for vp6, add a few memleak fixes and some packed YUV fixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump snapshot for many swscale changes, disable backingstore for better performance in composite environments, add support for more multimedia keys, fix strict casting violation for aac decoder, flv pts fixes, matroska fixes, many AC3 fixes, x264 enhancements, fixes playing of some mp4/mov/avi files provided lately
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Added MXF muxer, fix wma regressions, fix mid/side stereo buggy output zeroing, add generic IIR filter interface with Butterworth lowpass filter implementation, fix decoding of ape 3.98 files, do not assign avctx->rc_eq to libx264's context and leave the decision to library, fix detection of MPEG4 in MPEG-PS, support invalid h264 that does not mark IDR with POC=0, fix an invalid free in the AVI muxer when an unsupported audio track is added, prevent a division by 0 in the g726 decoder, fix round to even for aspect ratio correction, add ac3/eac3 support for many formats like mov/mp4/mkv etc., add support for the PIX_FMT_RGB32, PIX_FMT_RGB555 and PIX_FMT_RGB565 in V4L2, fix alac crash where bits per sample is not set, set block align in av_write_header if not set, fix stsd box size for ac3 in mp4, lots of matroska fixes (pts, seek etc.)
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix buffer overflow in dca, enhance lavf support, fix PCM DVD divide by zero, do not set timestamp information for a non existing AVStream, lots of constantization, fix fir_32bands_perfect table, fix fps for v4l1 cams in test script
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump to fix possibly exploitable freeing of pointers that have not been allocated in rc_eq, overflow in AVStream pts_buffer, alac samplesize overflow, nut demuxer double free etc. and many bugfixes
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Bump to fix CVE-2008-3230, add nut and dirac support, fix lots of segfaults, avc1 optimizations etc.
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix exploitable psxstr demuxer, fix dvdnav bindings
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Version bump
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix possible heap overflow in av_fast_realloc and CVE-2008-0073 and some enhancements like better framedrop support

Update.Comment: Bump for osd fixes, fixes for mencoder regression, avc1 optimizations etc., fix subtitle display on pause and switch to ass by default

Update.Comment: Prevent possible buffer overflow in parsing flac metadata and mov alike containers, add some fixes for stuff like mms stream id limit

Update.Comment: Bump to new snapshot. - Lots of format/codec fixes, aspect ratio fixes, workarounds for mp4, flv, mkv. - Add mencoder default config with profiles and add a default font thanks to Türker Sezer - Fix test-webcam regressions - Many menu enhancements - Switch to Xss based screensaver and remove hacky system() stuff - Add screenscale support - Add protocol and extension based config support etc. etc.
Update.Name: Onur Küçük

Update.Comment: Fix gui cache settings saving, wma_decode, subtitle loading, dvd memleak, revise empty vobsub patch
